${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:SparkleStrike.NAME: Strike
${modID}:SparkleStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random target, then deal !${modID}:sparkleStrikeSecondHitDamage! damage to a second random target.

${modID}:SparkleSixGunRoulette.NAME: Six Gun Roulette
${modID}:SparkleSixGunRoulette.DESCRIPTION: Choose a target at random to lose !D! HP. If Sparkle damages herself, gain !B! block.

${modID}:SparkleHeelKick.NAME: Heel Kick
${modID}:SparkleHeelKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, then randomly apply either !${modID}:sparkleHeelKickWeak! Weak or !${modID}:sparkleHeelKickVulnerable! Vulnerable. ${modID}:Unexpected.

${modID}:SparkleThisIsBoring.NAME: This is Boring!
${modID}:SparkleThisIsBoring.DESCRIPTION: Increase the cost of all cards in your hand by 1 for this combat.

${modID}:SparkleWaitForIt.NAME: Wait For It
${modID}:SparkleWaitForIt.DESCRIPTION: Each turn, increase the cost of a random card in your hand by 1 for the rest of combat.

${modID}:SparkleAnticipationIsKing.NAME: Anticipation is King
${modID}:SparkleAnticipationIsKing.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. Deal !D! for each card discarded to a random enemy.

${modID}:SparkleDommyVibes.NAME: Dommy Vibes
${modID}:SparkleDommyVibes.DESCRIPTION: Inflict !${modID}:SparkleDommyVibesWeakAmount! Weak and !${modID}:SparkleDommyVibesVulnerableAmount! Vulnerable to an enemy.

${modID}:SparkleSadMask.NAME: Sad Mask
${modID}:SparkleSadMask.DESCRIPTION: Inflict !${modID}:SparkleSadMaskMinimumWeak! to !${modID}:SparkleSadMaskMaximumWeak! Weak, !${modID}:SparkleSadMaskMinimumVulnerable! to !${modID}:SparkleSadMaskMaximumVulnerable! Vulnerable, and !${modID}:SparkleSadMaskMinimumFrail! to !${modID}:SparkleSadMaskMaximumFrail! Frail to yourself and the target enemy.
${modID}:SparkleSadMask.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Inflict !${modID}:SparkleSadMaskMinimumWeak! to !${modID}:SparkleSadMaskMaximumWeak! Weak, !${modID}:SparkleSadMaskMinimumVulnerable! to !${modID}:SparkleSadMaskMaximumVulnerable! Vulnerable, and !${modID}:SparkleSadMaskMinimumFrail! to !${modID}:SparkleSadMaskMaximumFrail! Frail to yourself once and the target enemy twice.

${modID}:SparkleLeaveItToChance.NAME: Leave it to Chance!
${modID}:SparkleLeaveItToChance.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, flip a coin. If heads, gain 1 energy, if tails, gain !${modID}:SparkleLeaveItToChanceBlockAmount! block.

${modID}:SparkleHeadsIWinTailsYouLose.NAME: Heads I Win, Tails You Lose!
${modID}:SparkleHeadsIWinTailsYouLose.DESCRIPTION: Flip a coin. If heads, gain !${modID}:SparkleHIWTYLEnergyGain! energy and draw !${modID}:SparkleHIWTYLNumCards! card(s). If tails, deal !D! damage and *Exhaust.

${modID}:SparkleShowstopper.NAME: Showstopper
${modID}:SparkleShowstopper.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the target for each card costing more than 3 energy in your hand.
${modID}:SparkleShowstopper.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the target twice for each card costing more than 3 energy in your hand.

${modID}:SparkleFireworksDisplay.NAME: Fireworks Display
${modID}:SparkleFireworksDisplay.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies !${modID}:SparkleFireworksDisplayNumBaseHits! to !${modID}:SparkleFireworksDisplayNumMaxHits! times.
